{"id":1225425983,"question_id":3387,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1712462995,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"448 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1225425983/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Median of Array Equal to K","memory":"69 MB","code":"class Solution {\n  public long minOperationsToMakeMedianK(int[] nums, int k) {\n    final int n = nums.length;\n    long operation = 0;\n\n    Arrays.sort(nums);\n    // index of median\n    final int m = n / 2;\n    operation += Math.abs(nums[m] - k);\n\n\n    System.out.println(\"m=\"+m);\n    \n         System.out.println(\"operation=\"+operation);\n    for (int j = m - 1; j >= 0 && k < nums[j]; j--) {\n      operation += nums[j] - k;\n\n         System.out.println(\"operation=\"+operation);\n    }\n\n    for (int j = m + 1; j < n && k > nums[j]; j++) {\n      operation += k - nums[j];\n      \n         System.out.println(\"operation=\"+operation);\n    }\n\n    return operation;\n  }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-median-of-array-equal-to-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
